backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining authorization mixins, blob storage, and data models for users, appointments, products, orders, media, and publications with associated mutable state and ID counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two homepage audio‑player features, their associated frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles and UI details of various frontend components across the application.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx as the module entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component handling authentication, payment status routing, profile setup, and rendering all major site sections with theming and global UI providers.
frontend/src/components/Biography.tsx: Biography section fetching bio content and rendering animated parallax visuals, styled portrait, and detailed biography layout.
frontend/src/components/Booking.tsx: Booking section showing consulting rate, membership‑gated access logic, and links to PayPal and membership options with animated background effects.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Drawer UI for viewing and managing cart items and initiating Stripe checkout sessions.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Displays contact information pulled from backend queries with styled icons and layout.
frontend/src/components/Credentials.tsx: Shows diploma and portrait images with decorative styling in a credentials section.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders footer with professional credentials list and copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header with scroll effects, section scrolling, mobile menu, and Internet Identity login logic.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with layered parallax backgrounds, cursor‑based movement, and scroll‑to‑section button.
frontend/src/components/Media.tsx: Renders the Training Videos section, checks user authentication and video access, and displays gated content with animated visuals.
frontend/src/components/Membership.tsx: Displays membership plans, user membership status, and PayPal subscription flow with decorative UI effects.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Shows a payment cancellation message with options to return home or retry by scrolling to the membership section.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Displays a success message after payment, refreshes membership data, and provides navigation options.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a basic user profile with form validation and submission via a saveProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/Publications.tsx: Fetches and displays a list of publications with Amazon links and includes a PayPal payment portal section.
frontend/src/components/Store.tsx: Displays a list of hardcoded apparel items with Bonfire purchase links and QR codes in a styled section.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal for configuring Stripe by submitting a secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/components/SupportDonations: Renders a styled donations section featuring Venmo and Cash App cards with QR images and links.
frontend/src/components/TrainingVideos.t: Fetches and displays training videos and documents with loading states and external watch links.
frontend/src/components/VideoModal.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a video modal component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks that call actor methods to fetch or mutate user profile, content, access checks, and media lists.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus extensive custom OKLCH variables and glow/metallic utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with Internet Identity context.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors with OKLCH tokens and enabling typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the ICP-backed React site, architecture notes, and known issues.
